autoVueTemplate.vueVersion.description: Select the Vue version to use for generated templates: Vue 2 or Vue 3.

autoVueTemplate.script.lang.description: Specify the language for the `<script>` tag in the generated template. Options: 'ts' (TypeScript), 'js' (JavaScript), or leave empty for no explicit language attribute.

autoVueTemplate.script.setup.description: Enable or disable the usage of `<script setup>` syntax in generated Vue 3 templates. Note that this option is applicable only when using Vue 3

autoVueTemplate.style.lang.description: Set the language for the `<style>` tag in the generated template, such as 'scss', 'less', or 'stylus'. Leave empty for standard CSS.

autoVueTemplate.style.scoped.description: Indicate whether the generated `<style>` tag should have the 'scoped' attribute, which limits the style rules to affect only the current component.

scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile-tests && pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
